Expense Management
// Instructions Area
To delete all the data from the database check the option from the toolbar.


Use the button (+) from the bottom of the screen to add new trips.
 To Edit or Delete a Trip check the dots from the specific trip card view.


Observation: when you delete a trip all the expenses related to the trip with as well be removed from database.


To add expenses for a trip click on the image card view.

Use the button (+) from the bottom of the screen to add new expenses.
 To Edit or Delete an Expense check the dots from the specific expense card view.


To view an expense click on the image card view.
